Posts.Content: On Feb 21, 2011 10:58 PM rute18 wrote: im only 19 and this has never happend to me... as i squeez my right nipple a greyish, black cant really tell the difference liquid comes out of my nipple im really scared...... i did the same on my left nipple but it came out like a yellowish color witch by wat i read is healty and normal but im still really concerned please someone if you have info about this please let  me know.... Good Morning - First, take a deep breath.  Second, go get a mammogram.  May not be a cause for alarm, but you need to go. I have the same blackish discharge on my right nipple also.  Had a galactogram (sp) done and all results fine.  Still having discharge after 6 months but they are keeping an eye on it.  I am 49 and was diagnosed around Thanksgiving with Stage 1 breast cancer on the opposite side.  Had lumpectomy and finishing radiation tomorrow.  Do you have any family history?  Please let us know how you are.
Posts.Title: im only 19 and have black, greyish liquid coming out of my right nipple......please help
